definitions: To be under the influence of a hallucinogenic drug.
To lose one's mental or emotional control; to act in a crazy or foolish way.
To make a mistake or error.
To stumble or fall over something.
examples: He's trippin' hard after taking those pills.
Why are you trippin' over such a small thing?
I was trippin' when I said that.
Be careful not to be trippin' on that rug.
